original_text: For it came to pass, when the flame went up toward heaven from off the altar, that the angel of the Lord ascended in the flame of the altar. And Manoah and his wife looked on it, and fell on their faces to the ground.
korean_text: 불꽃이 제단에서부터 하늘로 올라가는 동시에 여호와의 사자가 제단 불꽃에 휩싸여 올라간지라 마노아와 그의 아내가 그것을 보고 그들의 얼굴을 땅에 대고 엎드리니라

sentences.original_text: when the flame went up toward heaven
that the angel of the Lord ascended
in the flame of the altar
And Manoah and his wife looked on it
and fell on their faces to the ground
